title: Is it part of the contract negotiations between Direct TV and WECT & WSFX wether the stations will be carried in HD?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. We ended up doing a story. Thanks for the question. Here's a link: http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20101230/ARTICLES/101239984/1004?p=all&tc=pgall
